infant.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a baby or very young child
infant.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
infant.translation[0].note_box[0].headin: – Meaning 1 : a baby or very young child
infant.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: The never-ending demands of a young infant can be very stressful for parents.
Newborn infants only a few hours old can distinguish between different voices.
Unborn infants can hear certain sounds while still in the mother’s womb.
The hospital provides life-saving care to premature infants.
Amy gave birth to a healthy infant.
Sick infants are treated in the intensive care nursery.
The number of infant deaths has fallen significantly.
The infant mortality rate doubled during the 1990s.
infant.translation[1].definitions[0].def: intended for babies or very young children
infant.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an infant company, organization etc has just started to exist or be developed
